description:
小编导读：本周的词汇精选出自《老友记》哦！莱斯利曾经抛弃菲比单飞，去发展自己的歌唱事业。对此菲比一直耿耿于怀，现在当两个昔日好友重新碰面，会发生什么有趣的故事呢？一起来听听吧！

台词 ：

Chandler:All right, listen, I have to go to the bathroom. But the place with big fish comes up again.. I'd like to know whether that's several big fish or just one big fish.

Joey:So Phoebe tells us you write jingles.

Phoebe:Actually I said she abandoned me to write jingles.

Joey:Anything we might've heard of？Yeah.

Leslie:Home is never far away.

All:Home is Homestar Stew.

Leslie:Yeah, but I don't do that anymore. I got knd of sick of it. And then I couldn't come up with anything good, so they fired me.

Phoebe:Bummer.

钱德勒：好吧，我要上洗手间。 但是如果你们又谈到大鱼... 我想知道是有几条大鱼还是一条大鱼。

乔伊：菲比说你写广告歌。

菲比：事实上我是说她抛弃我去写广告歌。

乔伊：有没有我们听过的？

莱斯利：有的。家永远不远。

所有人：回家的感觉就是家星燉品。

莱斯利：但实际上我已经不写了，我有点厌倦这些。 再说我也写不出任何好的作品了，所以他们开了我。

菲比：太可惜了。

例句示范音频（BY好好）

The word "bum" is used as a noun to describe a person who is not interested in working and chooses to survive on meager resources. Sometimes we use this word to describe homeless people, but "bum" is applied to many different situations. “bum”这个单词经常作名词，用来形容一个人对工作提不起兴趣，依靠微薄的工资生存，有时候我们还用“bum”形容无家可归的人，但是“bum”可以运用到很多不同的情况下。

There are a couple of bums looking for something to eat from the garbage cans in the alley.很多流浪者在小巷的垃圾桶里寻找食物。

They say you shouldn't give money to a bum because he should learn how to earn his own income.他们说，你不应该给乞丐钱，因为他应该学会自己获取收入。

Our neighbor dresses like a bum even though he has a lot of money.我们的邻居打扮得像个乞丐，尽管他十分富有。

He met a bum while walking down the road.他走在路上，碰到了一个流浪乞丐。

Sometimes the word "bum" is used for people who are incompetent or careless:有时候“bum”用来形容某个人没有能力或是粗心：

That doctor is a bum. He gave me the wrong advice.这个医生真没用，给我的意见都不管用。

The governor is a bum. He should be replaced.这个统治者十分无能，应该被取代了。

Our waiter is a bum. He made a mistake on our order.我们的服务员很粗心，把菜单搞错了。

You can use the word "bum" as a verb to mean a person is wandering aimlessly, or a person is made to feel sad.我们还可以将“bum”用作动词，表示一个人漫无目的地徘徊，或是形容一个人十分忧伤。

Those kids are bumming around downtown.那些孩子在小镇上游荡。

Let's go to the mall and bum around.我们一起去购物中心转转吧！

I'm just bumming around the house today. 今天我绕屋子溜达了一圈。

They were bummed out when their team lost the game.得知他们队失败的消息后，他们十分伤心。

Stop talking about death. You're bumming me out! 不要再讲与死亡有关的内容了，你让我很难受！

The word "bummer" is used to describe a depressing situation:“bummer”可以用来形容令人沮丧的场景。

This is a bummer.真失望。

That movie was a bummer.这部电影真差劲。

Bummer.真遗憾。

声明：本文系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 美剧词汇精讲：《老友记》bum

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

 

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Sore shoulder
A sore shoulder means discomfort is felt in the shoulder. Who has a sore shoulder? What is the cause of the soreness? What can be done to relieve the discomfort?
This week's topic: They had sore shoulders... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) massaging sore shoulders
2) sore shoulders from sitting for too long
3) using a hot pack on a sore shoulder
4) carrying a heavy bag for too long, resulting in sore shoulders
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

Of course he was not really sore; he was not on the ground for that long, besides, he was more physically fit than that. He just wanted to look like he was having sore shoulders. While doing so, he casually glanced around the office, now seeing it in a different light. He was no longer looking at the room from the pure perspective of an interior designer. He spotted several spots which would be a good place to put a bug. He turned towards the painting hanging on the back wall.

title: 英文天天写：Sore Shoulder

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

说到Rose Melberg, 不得不说说Twee Pop. 把Twee Pop比作泡泡糖独立摇滚乐最适合不过--它的音乐有着D.I.Y的精神,但又蔑视朋克乐的传统惯例.它有着一种自摇滚乐诞生起就未曾听到过的直率天真的特质。Twee pop的Top Artist有诸如Belle & Sebastian, Cannanes? Softies, Tiger Trap等等，而Melberg最初是Tiger Trap的vocal和guitar,接着担任Softies的主唱，后来还跑去Gaze打鼓。98年Melberg发行了自己的专辑Portola,时阁6年，又推出了这张Cast Away the Clouds. Melberg也许并不算Twee Pop最好的演绎者，事实上，从这张专辑里她身上最后的indie痕迹渐渐移除，Melberg开始成长为真正成熟的Vocalist。Cast Away the Clouds是如此的乾净，无拘束，稀疏的钢琴漂浮在吉他中，Melberg天使般甜美的嗓音让你感觉仿佛她就坐在你身边，和你一同在云端漂向天堂。

模唱：

讲解：

Truly madly
Don't you know I hardly
sleep anymore again it's after the fall
I go sadly crazy nightly
thinking of how to do when you left
but the best I can do is dreaming of you
if only sleep would come
and I could hold
you're near until you
disapear in the morning light
at least you're mine for the night

there's no other underneath my cover
but thoughts of you keep me warm a whole night through
and even if there real is no place where dreams come true
my heart is still with you
but it's through start dust
I imagine us
if only sleep would find me
I could hold
you're near until you disappear when
each new day takes you away
I hope
you're near until you disappear when
each new day comes to take you away
each new day
comes to take you away

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：each new day

description:
Islamic State, the armed group that has taken over parts of Iraq and Syria has killed many hostages, including journalists, and in some cases, publicized their deaths in gruesome videos and we'll be hearing in the news today that one of the killers in the films, known as Jihadi John, has now been identified. Despite the risks, Jürgen Todenhöfer, a 74-year-old German reporter who's also been a judge and a politician approached the group with the request to spend time with them and interview some in their ranks. They agreed. And last December Jürgen spent ten days with IS fighters. When I spoke to him from Munich, he told me how he first made contact with them.

I saw many fighters, many German Jihadists were on Facebook. So I, and we, my son, we wrote to around about 100 people. We got 15 answers and out of these 15s, two were very interesting and one of them was from IS. He said he was not authorised to speak to the public but he would give me somebody from the media department and their propaganda machine is extremely clever. We discussed more than half a year.
